english.segment1: When we sing. Hear our songs, to You. When we dance. Feel us move, to You. When we laugh. Fill our smiles, with You
english.segment2: Pre-Chorus: When we lift our voices. Louder still. Can You hear us?. Can You feel?
english.segment3: Chorus: We love You, Lord. We love You. We love You. We love You, Lord. We love You. We love You
english.segment4: When we sing [LOUD!]. Hear our songs, to You. When we dance [ROUND!]. Feel us move, to You. When we laugh [ALOUD!]. Fill our smiles, with You
english.segment7: Bridge: And our love is big. Our love is loud. Fill this place with this love now [4x]. And our love is big. Our love is loud. Fill our lungs. To sing it now..
english.segment9: Out: We lift our voices louder still. Our God is near. Our God is here.
